---

- name: Manage pets for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_pet_id: 123
    local_pet_endpoint: "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"
    local_pet_name: "Tess"

  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Add pet
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.add_pet
      vars:
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"
        pet_name: "{{ local_pet_name }}"
        category_id: 1
        category_name: "Dogs"
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Petstore API - Find pets by status "1"
output:
ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.find_pets_by_status
      vars:
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

- name: Manage pets for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_pet_id: 123
    local_pet_endpoint: "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"
    local_pet_name: "Tess"

  tasks:
    - name: Include add pet role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.add_pet
      vars:
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"
        pet_name: "{{ local_pet_name }}"
        category_id: 1
        category_name: "Dogs"
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Include find pets by status role "16"
output:
ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.find_pets_by_status
      vars:
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

  tasks:
    - name: Include add pet role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.add_pet
      vars:

        category_id: 1
        category_name: "Dogs"
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Include find pets by status role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.find_pets_by_status
      vars:
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Include Get pet by ID role
output:
ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_pet_by_id

- name: Manage users for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_user_id: 1
    local_pet_endpoint: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user

  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Create user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.create_user
      vars:
          user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
          user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
          username: "johndoe"
          first_name: "John"
          last_name: "Doe"
          email: "john.doe@example.com"
          password: "password123"
          phone: "123-456-7890"
          user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Update user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.update_user
      vars:
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
        username: "johndoe"
        first_name: "John"
        last_name: "Doe"
        email: "john.doe@example.com"
        password: "newpassword123"
        phone: "987-654-3210"
        user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Get user by username "18"
output:
ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_user_by_username
      vars:
        username: "johndoe"
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

- name: Manage users for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_user_id: 1
    local_pet_endpoint: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user

  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Create user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.create_user
      vars:
          user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
          user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
          username: "johndoe"
          first_name: "John"
          last_name: "Doe"
          email: "john.doe@example.com"
          password: "password123"
          phone: "123-456-7890"
          user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Update user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.update_user
      vars:
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
        username: "johndoe"
        first_name: "John"
        last_name: "Doe"
        email: "john.doe@example.com"
        password: "newpassword123"
        phone: "987-654-3210"
        user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Get user by username
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_user_by_username
      vars:
        username: "johndoe"
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Petstore API - Delete user by username "8"
output:
ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.delete_user_by_username
      vars:
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        username: "johndoe"
